Address.label: Address
Address.value: 3900 DALLAS PARKWAY,SUITE 500, PLANO, Texas, 75093, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Cinemark Holdings Inc is the third- largest motion picture exhibitor in the United States. The company operates 5,868 screens in U.S and Latin America. Cinemark generates nearly $3 billion in revenue--approximately 60% from admissions, 30% from concessions, and 10% from other sources, such as in-lobby video games. Most of Cinemark's theaters are located in midsize cities or suburbs of large cities.
